## Phase 1: Content Analysis

### Key Learnings Extracted

| Domain | Insight | Significance |
|--------|---------|--------------|
| Açoriano | Archaic Portuguese features preserved in Azores | Geographic isolation = linguistic conservation |
| Manezinho | Brazilian dialect with Azorean DNA | 1748-1756 migration created inheritance |
| Linguistics | Dialect genealogy patterns | Languages evolve like code inheritance |
| Localization | Multi-variant architecture | Base → Regional → Dialect fallback chains |

### Breakthrough Discovery
**Dialect Inheritance Pattern**: Language variant relationships mirror OOP inheritance:
- Base class = parent dialect
- Derived class = descendant dialect
- Inherited methods = preserved features
- Overridden methods = simplified features
- New methods = local innovations
